speaker: Justin M
title: Harnessing the Power of AI in Music Production
description: AI is enhancing the way we make music. Are you using AI in your production workflows? What is it used for? How will it change the music landscape? Does AI enhance or reduce creativity? This is a rapidly evolving technology where companies such as Google, Meta, and OpenAI, as well artists such as David Guetta, Grimes, and DJ Jazzy Jeff are innovating within. In this discussion we'll examine various AI tools to determine which are the most relevant in: processing vocals; processing drums and percussions; composing melodies and harmonies. We'll also talk about the ongoing debate surrounding creativity. If AI can generate music from scratch, then what's the role of human artists?
